name: Debt-EMI Calculator - Notion template
description: A notion template that helps in performing various calculations related to debt. It contains the following features:EMI Calculator: Calculates the EMI to be paid based on the Loan amount, Interest rate & Time period of the loan.Pay-off Time Calculator: Calculates the change in time it will take to repay the loan, if the EMI is changed.Loan Affordability Calculator: Calculates the amount one can borrow based on the EMI one can pay on a monthly basis.Pay-off Date EMI Calculator: Calculates the
features: EMI Calculator:Calculates the EMI to be paid based on the Loan amount, Interest rate & Time period of the loan.; Pay-off Time Calculator:Calculates the change in time it will take to repay the loan, if the EMI is changed.; Loan Affordability Calculator:Calculates the amount one can borrow based on the EMI one can pay on a monthly basis.; Pay-off Date EMI Calculator:Calculates the EMI required to be paid in order to pay-off the loan before a set date.; Debt-Income Ratio:This calculates the ratio depicting how much of the income is tied up in debt repayment obligations.
